channel.title: IndaStreet - Global Massage & Wellness Directory
channel.description: Find professional massage therapists, spa treatments, and wellness services worldwide. Coverage in Indonesia, Philippines, UK, USA, Australia, and Germany. Expert therapists, verified spas, instant booking.

item.title: IndaStreet Expands Globally - Now in 6 Countries
item.description: IndaStreet now serves Indonesia, Philippines, United Kingdom, United States, Australia, and Germany. Find massage therapists, spa services, and wellness professionals in 200+ cities worldwide.

item.title: UK Massage Directory - Find Therapists in London, Manchester, Birmingham
item.description: IndaStreet launches in the United Kingdom. Find professional massage therapists and spa services in London, Manchester, Birmingham, Edinburgh, Glasgow, and 20+ UK cities. Sports massage, deep tissue, Swedish massage, and more.

item.title: USA Massage Directory - NYC, LA, Chicago, Miami & 28 Major Cities
item.description: Find licensed massage therapists across the United States. Coverage in New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago, Miami, San Francisco, Boston, Seattle, and 20+ major metros. Licensed professionals, verified spas, instant booking.

item.title: Australia Massage Directory - Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane & More
item.description: IndaStreet launches in Australia. Find qualified massage therapists in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, Adelaide, and 15+ Australian cities. Remedial massage, relaxation massage, sports therapy.

item.title: Germany Massage Directory - Berlin, Munich, Hamburg, Frankfurt
item.description: IndaStreet now in Germany. Find professional massage therapists in Berlin, Munich, Hamburg, Frankfurt, Cologne, and 18+ German cities. Bilingual support (German/English). Wellness massage, physiotherapy, spa treatments.

item.title: Philippines Massage Directory - Manila, Cebu, Boracay & More
item.description: Find professional massage therapists across the Philippines. Coverage in Manila, Makati, Quezon City, Cebu City, Boracay, and 10+ major cities. Hilot massage, Swedish massage, deep tissue, aromatherapy.

item.title: Indonesia Massage Directory - Bali, Jakarta, Yogyakarta & 23+ Cities
item.description: Indonesia's original massage directory. Find therapists in Canggu, Seminyak, Ubud, Jakarta, Yogyakarta, and 20+ cities. Balinese massage, traditional Indonesian therapy, facial treatments, home service available.
